thread.title: Breakfast club co-host Charlamagne Tha God dubs Shkreli “Donkey of the Day”

title: Breakfast club co-host Charlamagne Tha God dubs Shkreli “Donkey of the Day”
text: Breakfast club co-host Charlamagne Tha God dubs Shkreli “Donkey of the Day” 1 Hour Ago Already the focus of widespread scorn in the news media, Martin Shkreli, who reportedly paid more than $2 million for the sole copy of a one-off album from legendary rap crew the Wu-Tang Clan, is ridiculed on POWER 105.1’s popular hip hop radio show, leading to a succession of public throw-downs. Season Premiere American Greed February 26 | Monday 10P ET/PT
